channel.title: How to delete the saradomin kills requirement. [317]
channel.description:
I was just wanting to get rid of the 20 saradomin wizard killa required to do godwars, if someone could help that'd be great
Thanks.

item.title: How to delete the saradomin kills requirement. [317]
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[quote=“The Provoked, post:4, topic:347832”]hey thanks a lot guys!

but wait, here’s my code:

if(objectID == 4755){ if(saraKills > 0){ toX = 2740; toY = 5074; saraKills -= 0; sM("The Saradomin kills drain from you.."); } else sM("You need at least 1 Saradomin kill to get in the cave."); }

and It makes me at least have 1 kill…

How could I make it not require kills?[/quote]

Just make it smaller

if(objectID == 4755){ toX = 2740; toY = 5074; }
lol…

Read full topic

item.title: How to delete the saradomin kills requirement. [317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

hey thanks a lot guys!

but wait, here’s my code:

if(objectID == 4755){ if(saraKills > 0){ toX = 2740; toY = 5074; saraKills -= 0; sM("The Saradomin kills drain from you.."); } else sM("You need at least 1 Saradomin kill to get in the cave."); }

and It makes me at least have 1 kill…

How could I make it not require kills?

item.source: How to delete the saradomin kills requirement. [317]

item.title: How to delete the saradomin kills requirement. [317]
item.dc:creator: @kingtren kingtren
item.description:
@kingtren wrote:

Yptingas is right here let me paste the code you need.
if(objectID == 4755){
if(saraKills > 19){
toX = 3064;
toY = 9583;
heightLevel = 0;
saraKills -= 20;
sM(“The Saradomin kills drain from you…”);
NpcDialogue = 150;
} else
sM(“You need at least 20 Saradomin kills to get in the cave.”);
}

if(saraKills > 19){ change this to >9 for 10 kills etc.
Then just change the sM to however many kills you want.
Also change
saraKills -= 20; change this to how many kills need to be removed.
Have fun

Read full topic
item.source: How to delete the saradomin kills requirement. [317]

item.title: How to delete the saradomin kills requirement. [317]
item.dc:creator: @ytpingas ytpingas
item.description:
@ytpingas wrote:

sorry if this doesnt help but what does the text say when u get 20 kills? if it says like: You have now gotten 20 kills, enter the portal

look for that sentence in client.java and if you find it and a 20 near that change it to what ever you want.

Sorry if ths doesnt work guys.

Read full topic
